info.name: Mamey FutureWampumID Operations API
info.description: Complete API collection for Mamey FutureWampumID Operations microservice

request.description: Returns server status including uptime, CPU usage, memory usage, disk space, app name, version, and timestamp

The Operations service is primarily event-driven. It tracks operations from all FWID services (Identities, DIDs, ZKPs, AccessControls, Credentials). Use SignalR client to connect to /fwid hub for real-time updates. gRPC service available for operation queries.
